item.title: GM
item.description: score:-58 Chances: General Motors reported its best vehicle sales since 2019, indicating a strong market position and consumer demand. The company’s Cruise robotaxi unit offered to resolve an investigation by the California Public Utilities Commission, which could help mitigate legal and regulatory risks.
